title: List of districts of Bangkok
text: <a href="Bangkok">Bangkok</a> is subdivided into 50 <a href="districts">districts</a> ("<a href="khet%20%28country%20subdivision%29">khet</a>", , , also sometimes wrongly called "<a href="amphoe">amphoe</a>" as in the other provinces, derived from <a href="Pali">Pali</a> "khetta", cognate to <a href="Sanskrit">Sanskrit</a> "kṣetra"), which are further subdivided into 180 <a href="subdistricts">subdistricts</a> ("<a href="khwaeng">khwaeng</a>", , ), roughly equivalent to "<a href="tambon">tambon</a>" in the other provinces.
